types.html:
montpelliérain (feminine montpelliéraine, masculine plural montpelliérains, feminine plural montpelliéraines)

  1. of, from or relating to the city of Montpellier, capital of Hérault department, Occitania, France
trans: of, from or relating to the city of Montpellier, capital of Hérault department, Occitania, France
of, from or relating to the city of Montpellier, capital of Hérault department, Occitania, France

types.html:
montpelliérain m (uncountable)

  1. the form of Occitan spoken in Montpellier
trans: the form of Occitan spoken in Montpellier
the form of Occitan spoken in Montpellier
